title: [Widow's Beach, Stone Platform]
description: A raised stone platform carved into a circle bridges the final expanse between sandbar and atoll to the north.  The water churns maliciously about the platform, breaking across the basalt sides to form white-capped waves that froth back and forth before eventually calming.  A deep rumbling can be heard in the distance, with no source in sight.

A raised stone platform carved into a circle stretches toward the atoll.  The water ahead churns maliciously, each wave capped with white, blending into the water below.  Rumbling can be heard in the distance with no source in sight.
